name: all-in-quizition
description: All*InQuizition monorepo: host, player, display apps with realtime server and shared packages.

scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,host,player,display -c cyan,magenta,green,yellow "npm --workspace apps/server run dev" "npm --workspace apps/host run dev" "npm --workspace apps/player run dev" "npm --workspace apps/display run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace packages/core && npm run build --workspace packages/net && npm run build --workspace packages/ui && npm run build --workspace apps/server && npm run build --workspace apps/host && npm run build --workspace apps/player && npm run build --workspace apps/display
scripts.one: npm run build && powershell -Command Start-Process http://localhost:7777 && npm start --workspace apps/server
